  "description": "Migliore Construczione &amp; Tecniche Limited is a construction company founded on the belief that only the best can deliver buildings, roads, bridges and other infrastructural structures for their intended uses and purposes. The company was founded and currently runs on the principles of six sigma quality management approach with emphasis on what is critical to individual client satisfaction. At MC&amp;T, we believe that today&rsquo;s competitive environment leaves no room for error.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Business Development Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos Island,&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid (3 days Onsite)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a strategic and results-driven Business Development Manager to drive the company&rsquo;s growth and market expansion initiatives.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building and maintaining strong client relationships, and developing strategies to increase revenue and market share.
	This role requires a proactive individual who can combine analytical thinking with exceptional communication and negotiation skills, while consistently reflecting the company&rsquo;s core values of urgency, reliability, and trust in every engagement.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, evaluate, and pursue new business opportunities to drive company growth and expand market presence.
	Develop and implement strategic business plans that align with the company&rsquo;s objectives and revenue targets.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with new and existing clients, partners, and stakeholders to foster long-term collaboration.
	Ideal candidate must be able to conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify emerging trends, potential clients, and untapped markets.
	Prepare and deliver compelling business presentations, proposals, and bids that effectively communicate value propositions.
	Collaborate with internal teams&mdash;such as operations, finance, and marketing&mdash;to ensure seamless execution of client projects and service delivery.
	Negotiate and close business deals while ensuring profitability and alignment with organizational goals.
	Track, analyze, and report on business development performance metrics, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
	Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to strengthen brand visibility and professional networks.
	Stay informed about industry developments and best practices to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
	3 years of proven experience as a Business Development Manager, Sales Executive, or in a similar growth-focused role, preferably within a service-oriented or technology-driven industry.
	Demonstrated success in identifying new business opportunities, developing client relationships, and achieving revenue targets.
	Proficiency in CRM and business management tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, or equivalents).


Skills and Competencies:


	Strong business acumen with the ability to identify growth opportunities and develop effective strategies to capture them.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills for building and maintaining client relationships.
	Strategic thinking and analytical capability to assess market trends, competition, and business performance.
	Proven ability to develop persuasive proposals and close high-value deals.
	Strong networking skills with the confidence to represent the company at industry events and client meetings.
	Ability to manage multiple business initiatives simultaneously and deliver results under tight deadlines.
	Collaborative mindset with the capacity to work effectively across cross-functional teams.
	Problem-solving orientation with a focus on delivering measurable growth and long-term client satisfaction.
	Adaptability and resilience in a fast-paced, target-driven business environment.
	High level of professionalism, integrity, and commitment to the company&rsquo;s core values of urgency, reliability, and trust.


Salary

Business Development Manager Job at Migliore Construczione & Tecniche Limited




        
    

        
        Migliore Construczione & Tecniche Limited is a construction company founded on the belief that only the best can deliver buildings, roads, bridges and other infrastructural structures for their intended uses and purposes. The company was founded and currently runs on the principles of six sigma quality management approach with emphasis on what is critical to individual client satisfaction. At MC&T, we believe that today’s competitive environment leaves no room for error.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid (3 days Onsite)
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Summary


	We are seeking a strategic and results-driven Business Development Manager to drive the company’s growth and market expansion initiatives.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building and maintaining strong client relationships, and developing strategies to increase revenue and market share.
	This role requires a proactive individual who can combine analytical thinking with exceptional communication and negotiation skills, while consistently reflecting the company’s core values of urgency, reliability, and trust in every engagement.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, evaluate, and pursue new business opportunities to drive company growth and expand market presence.
	Develop and implement strategic business plans that align with the company’s objectives and revenue targets.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with new and existing clients, partners, and stakeholders to foster long-term collaboration.
	Ideal candidate must be able to conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify emerging trends, potential clients, and untapped markets.
	Prepare and deliver compelling business presentations, proposals, and bids that effectively communicate value propositions.
	Collaborate with internal teams—such as operations, finance, and marketing—to ensure seamless execution of client projects and service delivery.
	Negotiate and close business deals while ensuring profitability and alignment with organizational goals.
	Track, analyze, and report on business development performance metrics, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
	Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to strengthen brand visibility and professional networks.
	Stay informed about industry developments and best practices to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
	3 years of proven experience as a Business Development Manager, Sales Executive, or in a similar growth-focused role, preferably within a service-oriented or technology-driven industry.
	Demonstrated success in identifying new business opportunities, developing client relationships, and achieving revenue targets.
	Proficiency in CRM and business management tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, or equivalents).


Skills and Competencies:


	Strong business acumen with the ability to identify growth opportunities and develop effective strategies to capture them.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills for building and maintaining client relationships.
	Strategic thinking and analytical capability to assess market trends, competition, and business performance.
	Proven ability to develop persuasive proposals and close high-value deals.
	Strong networking skills with the confidence to represent the company at industry events and client meetings.
	Ability to manage multiple business initiatives simultaneously and deliver results under tight deadlines.
	Collaborative mindset with the capacity to work effectively across cross-functional teams.
	Problem-solving orientation with a focus on delivering measurable growth and long-term client satisfaction.
	Adaptability and resilience in a fast-paced, target-driven business environment.
	High level of professionalism, integrity, and commitment to the company’s core values of urgency, reliability, and trust.


Salary
N300,000 - N350,000 monthly.

Customer Relations & Sales Officer Job at the Startup Place Limited




        
    

        
        The Startup Place Limited is a Business Consulting firm with key focus on Startup Development, Digital Marketing and Business Growth. We pull a team of passionate entrepreneurs and consultant about helping you start, grow and scale your business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Relations & Sales Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Serve as the first point of contact for customers through phone, email, or in-person interactions.
	Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and requests promptly and professionally.
	Maintain a positive, empathetic, and professional attitude toward customers at all times.
	Promote and sell company products and services to new and existing customers.
	Develop and implement basic marketing strategies to attract new clients and retain existing ones.
	Collaborate with the sales and marketing team to meet and exceed monthly sales targets.
	Keep accurate records of customer interactions, feedback, and transactions.
	Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction and encourage repeat business.
	Monitor market trends and competitor activities to identify new business opportunities.
	Prepare regular reports on customer feedback, sales performance, and marketing activities.


Qualifications and Skills


	Minimum of OND / HND / B.Sc in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	Proven experience in customer service, sales, or marketing roles.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills.
	Good problem-solving and conflict-resolution abilities.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Proficiency in MS Office and social media marketing tools.
	Customer-focused mindset with a passion for sales and relationship building.:


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@thestartupplaceng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "description": "Maventeq Systems Limited&nbsp;- Our client, a multinational Oil and Gas company in Nigeria, is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cost Controller
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Service Division: Projects, Operations and Asset Maintenance
Reports To: PPS Manager

Job Purpose


	This position shall be responsible for developing, implementing, and maintaining detailed cost management systems to ensure project execution aligns with the established budget and forecast.
	The Cost Controller shall provide critical, forward-looking analysis and data-driven insights to support proactive decision-making by company executive management.


Key Responsibilities &amp; Duties


	Shall develop and maintain the project&#39;s Cost Breakdown Structure (CBS) and establish the official cost baseline for all company projects and operations.
	Shall create detailed cost estimates for all project phases and prepare accurate forecasts (Estimate at Completion - EAC) to predict final project costs.
	Shall conduct Earned Value Management (EVM) analysis to measure project health using key indices (CPI, SPI) and assess schedule and cost performance.
	Shall implement and manage robust ERP systems (SAP, Odoo, etc) to track all project commitments, expenditures, and accruals against the approved budget.
	Shall identify, analyze, and report on cost variances, determining root causes and recommending corrective actions to management.
	Shall quantify the financial impact of project changes and trends, ensuring all impacts are captured in the Management of Change (MoC) process and budget updates.
	Shall work with the project and operations team to quantify financial risks and opportunities, and monitor the use of contingency funds.
	Shall generate timely and clear cost reports, dashboards, and presentations to communicate financial status and projections to company management.
	Shall utilize the company&#39;s ERP (SAP, Odoo, etc) and project controls software as the primary tools for all cost management and reporting activities.
	Shall provide proactive, data-driven insights to support decision-making, offering early warnings of potential cost overruns and identifying cost-saving opportunities.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Accuracy of cost forecasts (Variance between Forecasted EAC and Final Actual Cost).
	Accuracy and timelinessa of Earned Value Management reporting.
	Effectiveness in early warning of cost overruns and identification of cost-saving opportunities.
	Quality and clarity of cost analysis and reporting.
	Adherence to project controls procedures and the ICMS framework.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Education:Bachelor&#39;s degree in Engineering (Civil, Mechanical, Chemical, or similar) is required. A post-graduate qualification in Project Management or Finance is an advantage.
	Experience:Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in a cost engineering or project controls role within the Oil &amp; Gas, Energy, or heavy construction industry.
	Technical Skills:
	
		Expert knowledge of cost engineering principles, Earned Value Management (EVM), and risk-based forecasting.
		Proficiency in using ERP systems (SAP, Odoo, etc)and advanced project controls software.
		Advanced skills in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Microsoft Excel, Power BI).
		Strong understanding of project scheduling principles and their integration with cost control.
	
	


Competencies &amp; Behavioural Attributes:


	Strong numerical and analytical skills with the ability to interpret technical data and its financial implications.
	A forward-looking approach, constantly seeking to identify trends and potential issues before they impact the budget.
	Meticulous attention to detail and a rigorous approach to data integrity and process.
	Ability to translate complex cost data into clear, actionable insights for the project team and management.
	Effectively collaborates with project managers, engineers, planners, and procurement specialists to achieve integrated project outcomes.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@maventeqsystems.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
